description: VMware vSphere Dashboard using the new Telegraf plugin (Grafana 7)

targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("vcenter")) AS "vCenter" FROM (SELECT "overhead_average", "vcenter" FROM  "vsphere_cluster_mem" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("clustername")) AS "Cluster"  FROM (SELECT "overhead_average", "vcenter" FROM  "vsphere_cluster_mem" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("esxhostname")) AS "ESXi" FROM (SELECT "coreUtilization_average", "esxhostname" FROM  "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("vmname")) AS "VM" FROM (SELECT "usage_average", "vmname" FROM  "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("dsname")) AS "Datastore" FROM (SELECT "capacity_latest", "dsname" FROM  "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT last("uptime_latest") AS "Uptime" FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("usagemhz_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "clustername" fill(none)

SELECT last("totalCapacity_average") * (last("usage_average")) / 100 * 1024 FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE  ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "clustername"  fill(none)
SELECT last("used_latest") * (100 / last("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) , "source"  fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("ready_summation") FROM "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE ("vmname" =~ /^$virtualmachine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "vmname" fill(none)

list.label: vCenter Server

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=vcenter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=clustername WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/
